<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<br>
<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">THIS AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT is entered into as of October 1, 2014, among TEXAS OIL &amp; CHEMICAL CO. II, INC., a Texas corporation (&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrower</font>&#8221;), the certain subsidiaries of the Borrower party hereto, as guarantors, the Lenders (defined herein), and BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., as Administrative Agent, Swingline Lender and L/C Issuer.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RECITALS</font>:</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;South Hampton (as defined below) and Bank of America, N.A. (in such capacity, the &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Existing Lender</font>&#8221;) are party to that certain Credit Agreement dated May 26, 2006 (as amended, restated, supplemented, or otherwise modified prior to the date hereof, the &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Restated Credit Agreement</font>&#8221;).</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">B.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Immediately prior to the effectiveness of this Agreement, (i) South Hampton will assign to Borrower, and Borrower will assume, all &#8220;Obligations&#8221; (as defined in the Restated Credit Agreement) of Borrower under the Restated Credit Agreement (the &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Assigned Obligations</font>&#8221;), and South Hampton will guaranty all of such Assigned Obligations, in each case pursuant to an Assignment and Assumption Agreement, and (ii) the Existing Lender will sell to the Lenders, and the Lenders shall purchase, on a pro rata basis all of the outstanding Loans (as defined in the Restated Credit Agreement), Liens (as defined in the Restated Credit Agreement) and Commitments (as defined in the Restated Credit Agreement) and other rights of the Existing Lender, in each case under and pursuant to documents in Proper Form, as defined below (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Assignment Transaction</font>&#8221;).</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">C.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;After giving effect to the Assignment Transaction, Borrower, the Administrative Agent, Swingline Lender, L/C Issuer and the Lenders desire to amend and restate (but not extinguish) the Restated Credit Agreement in its entirety as hereinafter set forth through the execution of this Agreement and on the terms and conditions set forth herein.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">D.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;It is the intention of the parties hereto that this Agreement is an amendment and restatement of the Restated Credit Agreement, and not a new or substitute credit agreement or novation of the Restated Credit Agreement, and except as otherwise provided in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.01</font> below, all loans and advances outstanding under the Restated Credit Agreement are deemed to be outstanding under this Agreement.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW THEREFORE</font>, in consideration of the mutual covenants and agreements herein contained, the parties hereto covenant and agree as follows:</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">ARTICLE I</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">DEFINITIONS AND ACCOUNTING TERMS</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.01&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Defined Terms</font></font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.&#160;&#160;As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall have the meanings set forth below:</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition</font>&#8221; means the acquisition, whether through a single transaction or a series of related transactions, of (a)&#160;a majority of the Voting Stock or other Controlling ownership interest in another Person (including the purchase of an option, warrant or convertible or similar type security to acquire such a controlling interest at the time it becomes exercisable by the holder thereof), whether by purchase of such equity or other ownership interest or upon the exercise of an option or warrant for, or conversion of securities into, such equity or other ownership interest, or (b)&#160;assets of another Person which constitute</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;all or substantially all of the assets of such Person or of a division, line of business or other business unit of such Person.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Borrowing</font>&#8221; means a borrowing consisting of simultaneous Acquisition Term Loans of the same Type and, in the case of Eurodollar Rate Loans, having the same Interest Period made by each of the Acquisition Term Lenders pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.01(a)</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Commitment</font>&#8221; means, as to each Acquisition Term Lender, its obligation to make an Acquisition Term Loan to the Borrower pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.01(a)</font> in an aggregate principal amount at any one time outstanding not to exceed the amount set forth opposite such Acquisition Term Lender&#8217;s name on <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule&#160;1.01(b) </font>under the caption &#8220;Acquisition Term Commitment&#8221; or opposite such caption in the Assignment and Assumption pursuant to which such Acquisition Term Lender becomes a party hereto, as applicable, as such amount may be adjusted from time to time in accordance with this Agreement.&#160;&#160;The Acquisition Term Commitment of all of the Acquisition Term Lenders on the Closing Date shall be $70,000,000.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Facility</font>&#8221; means, at any time, (a)&#160;on or prior to the Closing Date, the aggregate amount of the Acquisition Term Commitments at such time and (b)&#160;thereafter, the aggregate principal amount of the Acquisition Term Loans of all Acquisition Term Lenders outstanding at such time.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Lender</font>&#8221; means (a)&#160;at any time on or prior to the Closing Date, any Lender that has an Acquisition Term Commitment at such time and (b) at any time after the Closing Date, any Lender that holds an Acquisition Term Loan at such time.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Loan</font>&#8221; means the advance made by any Acquisition Term Lender under the Acquisition Term Facility.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Acquisition Term Note</font>&#8221; means a promissory note made by the Borrower in favor of an Acquisition Term Lender evidencing the Acquisition Term Loan made by such Acquisition Term Lender, substantially in the form of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit&#160;K-1</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Act</font>&#8221; has the meaning specified in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 11.19</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Additional Secured Obligations</font>&#8221; means (a) all obligations arising under Secured Cash Management Agreements and Secured Hedge Agreements and (b) all costs and expenses incurred in connection with enforcement and collection of the foregoing, including the fees, charges and disbursements of counsel, in each case whether direct or indirect (including those acquired by assumption), absolute or contingent, due or to become due, now existing or hereafter arising and including interest and fees that accrue after the commencement by or against any Loan Party or any Affiliate thereof of any proceeding under any Debtor Relief Laws naming such Person as the debtor in such proceeding, regardless of whether such interest and fees are allowed claims in such proceeding;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">&#160;</font>provided that Additional Secured Obligations of a Guarantor shall exclude any Excluded Swap Obligations with respect to such Guarantor.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Administrative Agent</font>&#8221; means Bank of America<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>in its capacity as administrative agent under any of the Loan Documents, or any successor administrative agent.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Administrative Agent&#8217;s Office</font>&#8221; means the Administrative Agent&#8217;s address and, as appropriate, account as set forth on <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule 1.01(a)</font> or such other address or account as the Administrative Agent may from time to time notify the Borrower and the Lenders.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Administrative Questionnaire</font>&#8221; means an Administrative Questionnaire in substantially the form of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit A</font> or any other form approved by the Administrative Agent.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Affiliate</font>&#8221; means, with respect to a specified Person, another Person that directly, or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, Controls or is Controlled by or is under common Control with the Person specified.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Aggregate Commitments</font>&#8221; means the Commitments of all the Lenders.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Agreement</font>&#8221; means this Credit Agreement.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Applicable Percentage</font>&#8221; means (a)&#160;in respect of the Acquisition Term Facility, with respect to any Acquisition Term Lender at any time, the percentage (carried out to the ninth decimal place) of the Acquisition Term Facility represented by (i)&#160;on or prior to the Closing Date, such Acquisition Term Lender&#8217;s Acquisition Term Commitment at such time and (ii)&#160;thereafter, the outstanding principal amount of such Acquisition Term Lender&#8217;s Acquisition Term Loan at such time, (b)&#160;in respect of the Term Facility, with respect to&#160;&#160;Term Lender at any time, the percentage (carried out to the ninth decimal place) of the Term Facility represented by (i)&#160;at any time during the Availability Period in respect of such Facility, such Term Lender&#8217;s Term Commitment at such time and (ii)&#160;thereafter, the outstanding principal amount of such Term Lender&#8217;s Term Loans at such time and (c)&#160;in respect of the Revolving Facility, with respect to any Revolving Lender at any time, the percentage (carried out to the ninth decimal place) of the Revolving Facility represented by such Revolving Lender&#8217;s Revolving Commitment at such time, subject to adjustment as provided in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.16</font>.&#160;&#160;If the Commitment of all of the Acquisition Term Lenders, Term Lenders and Revolving Lenders to make the Acquisition Term Loan, Term Loans and Revolving Loans and the obligation of the L/C Issuer to make L/C Credit Extensions have been terminated pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 8.02</font>, or if the Acquisition Term Commitments, Term Commitments and Revolving<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>Commitments have expired, then the Applicable Percentage of each Acquisition Term Lender, Term Lender and Revolving Lender in respect of the Acquisition Term Facility, Term Facility and Revolving Facility shall be determined based on the Applicable Percentage of such Acquisition Term Lender, Term Lender and Revolving Lender in respect of the Acquisition Term Facility, Term Facility and Revolving Facility most recently in effect, giving effect to any subsequent assignments.&#160;&#160;The Applicable Percentage of each Lender in respect of each Facility is set forth opposite the name of such Lender on <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Schedule 1.01(b)</font> or in the Assignment and Assumption pursuant to which such Lender becomes a party.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Applicable Rate</font>&#8221; means, for any day, the rate per annum set forth below opposite the applicable Level then in effect (based on the Consolidated Leverage Ratio<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">)</font>, it being understood that the Applicable Rate for (a) Revolving Loans that are Base Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Revolving Loans&#8221; and &#8220;Base Rate&#8221;, (b)&#160;Revolving Loans that are Eurodollar Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Revolving Loans&#8221; and &#8220;Eurodollar Rate &amp; Letter of Credit Fee&#8221;, (c)&#160;that portion of the Acquisition Term Loan comprised of Base Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Acquisition Term Loan&#8221; and &#8220;Base Rate&#8221;, (d)&#160;that portion of the Acquisition Term Loan comprised of Eurodollar Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Acquisition Term Loan&#8221; and &#8220;Eurodollar Rate &amp; Letter of Credit Fee&#8221;, (e)&#160;that portion of the Term Loan comprised of Base Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Term Loan&#8221; and &#8220;Base Rate&#8221;, (f)&#160;that portion of the Term Loan comprised of Eurodollar Rate Loans shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Term Loan&#8221; and &#8220;Eurodollar Rate &amp; Letter of Credit Fee&#8221;, (g)&#160;the Letter of Credit Fee shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Revolving Loans&#8221; and &#8220;Eurodollar Rate &amp; Letter of Credit Fee&#8221;, and (h)&#160;the Commitment Fee shall be the percentage set forth under the column &#8220;Commitment Fee&#8221;:</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Any increase or decrease in the Applicable Rate resulting from a change in the Consolidated Leverage Ratio shall become effective as of the first Business Day immediately following the date a Compliance Certificate is delivered pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 6.02(a)</font>; <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">provided, however</font>, that if a Compliance Certificate is not delivered when due in accordance with such <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 6.02(a)</font>, then, upon the request of the Required Lenders, Pricing Level 3 shall apply, in each case as of the first Business Day after the date on which such Compliance Certificate was required to have been delivered and in each case shall remain in effect until the first Business Day following the date on which such Compliance Certificate is delivered.&#160;&#160;In addition, at all times while the Default Rate is in effect, the highest rate set forth in each column of the Applicable Rate shall apply.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this definition, (a)&#160;the determination of the Applicable Rate for any period shall be subject to the provisions of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.10(b)</font> and (b)&#160;the initial Applicable Rate shall be set forth in Level 3 until the first Business Day immediately following the date a Compliance Certificate is delivered pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 6.02(a)</font> for the fiscal quarter ending December 31, 2014 to the Administrative Agent.&#160;&#160;Any adjustment in the Applicable Rate shall be applicable to all Credit Extensions then existing or subsequently made or issued.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Applicable Revolving Percentage</font>&#8221; means with respect to any Revolving Lender at any time, such Revolving Lender&#8217;s Applicable Percentage in respect of the Revolving Facility at such time.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Appraisal</font>&#8221;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>means a written appraisal in Proper Form of the Mortgaged Property prepared on an &#8220;as-completed&#8221; basis by an independent MAI appraiser reasonably acceptable to Administrative Agent and properly certified by the State of Texas in accordance with Title XI of the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery and Enforcement Act of 1989, or, at the Administrative Agent&#8217;s option, by Administrative Agent&#8217;s &#8220;in-house&#8221; appraiser.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Appropriate Lender</font>&#8221; means, at any time, (a)&#160;with respect to any Facility, a Lender that has a Commitment with respect to such Facility or holds a Loan under such Facility at such time, (b)&#160;with respect to the Letter of Credit Sublimit, (i)&#160;the L/C Issuer and (ii)&#160;if any Letters of Credit have been issued pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.03</font>, the Revolving Lenders and (c)&#160;with respect to the Swingline Sublimit, (i)&#160;the Swingline Lender and (ii)&#160;if any Swingline Loans are outstanding pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.04(a)</font>, the Revolving Lenders.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">4</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Approved Fund</font>&#8221; means any Fund that is administered or managed by (a)&#160;a Lender, (b)&#160;an Affiliate of a Lender or (c)&#160;an entity or an Affiliate of an entity that administers or manages a Lender.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Arranger</font>&#8221; means Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner &amp; Smith Incorporated, in its capacity as sole lead arranger and sole bookrunner.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Assignment and Assumption</font>&#8221; means an assignment and assumption entered into by a Lender and an Eligible Assignee (with the consent of any party whose consent is required by <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 11.06(b)</font>), and accepted by the Administrative Agent, in substantially the form of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit&#160;B</font> or any other form (including an electronic documentation form generated by use of an electronic platform) approved by the Administrative Agent.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Assignment Transaction</font>&#8221; is defined in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Recital B</font> above.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Attributable Indebtedness</font>&#8221; means, on any date, (a)&#160;in respect of any Capitalized Lease of any Person, the capitalized amount thereof that would appear on a balance sheet of such Person prepared as of such date in accordance with GAAP, (b)&#160;in respect of any Synthetic Lease Obligation, the capitalized amount of the remaining lease or similar payments under the relevant lease or other applicable agreement or instrument that would appear on a balance sheet of such Person prepared as of such date in accordance with GAAP if such lease or other agreement or instrument were accounted for as a Capitalized Lease, (c)&#160;all Synthetic Debt of such Person.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Audited Financial Statements</font>&#8221; means the audited Consolidated balance sheet of Borrower and its&#160;&#160;Subsidiaries for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2013, and the related Consolidated statements of income or operations, shareholders&#8217; equity and cash flows for such fiscal year of Borrower and its Subsidiaries, including the notes thereto.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Authorization to Share Insurance Information</font>&#8221; means the authorization substantially in the form of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit Q</font> (or such other form as required by each of the Loan Party&#8217;s insurance companies).</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Availability Period</font>&#8221; means (a)&#160;in respect of the Revolving Facility, the period from and including the Closing Date to the earliest of (i)&#160;the Maturity Date for the Revolving Facility, (ii)&#160;the date of termination of the Revolving Commitments pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 2.06</font>, and (iii)&#160;the date of termination of the Commitment of each Revolving Lender to make Revolving Loans and of the obligation of the L/C Issuer to make L/C Credit Extensions pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 8.02</font> and (b)&#160;in respect of the Term Facility, the period from and including the Closing Date to the earliest of (i)&#160;December 31, 2015, (ii)&#160;the Maturity Date for the Term Facility and (iii)&#160;the date of termination of the commitments of the respective Term Lenders to make Term Loans pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 8.02</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Bank of America</font>&#8221; means Bank of America, N.A. and its successors.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Base Rate</font>&#8221; means for any day a fluctuating rate of interest per annum equal to the highest of (a)&#160;the Federal Funds Rate plus 0.50%, (b)&#160;the rate of interest in effect for such day as publicly announced from time to time by Bank of America as its &#8220;prime rate,&#8221; and (c)&#160;the Eurodollar Rate plus 1.00%.&#160;&#160;The &#8220;prime rate&#8221; is a rate set by Bank of America based upon various factors including Bank of America&#8217;s costs and desired return, general economic conditions and other factors, and is used as a reference point for pricing some loans, which may be priced at, above, or below such announced rate.&#160;&#160;Any change in such prime rate announced by Bank of America shall take effect at the opening of business on the day specified in the public announcement of such change.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">5</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Base Rate Loan</font>&#8221; means a Revolving Loan, an Acquisition Term Loan or a Term Loan that bears interest based on the Base Rate.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrower</font>&#8221; has the meaning specified in the introductory paragraph hereto.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrower Materials</font>&#8221; has the meaning specified in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 6.02</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Borrowing</font>&#8221; means a Revolving Borrowing, a Swingline Borrowing, an Acquisition Term Borrowing or Term Borrowing, as the context may require.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Business Day</font>&#8221; means any day other than a Saturday, Sunday or other day on which commercial banks are authorized to close under the Laws of, or are in fact closed in, the state where the Administrative Agent&#8217;s Office is located and, if such day relates to any Eurodollar Rate Loan, means any such day that is also a London Banking Day.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Capital Expenditures</font>&#8221; means, with respect to any Person for any period, any expenditure in respect of the purchase or other acquisition of any fixed or capital asset (excluding normal replacements and maintenance which are properly charged to current operations), <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">other than</font> any such expenditure financed solely with the proceeds from (a) the issuance of equity interests of such Person, or (b) equity contributed to such Person by its equity owners in the form of cash.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Capitalized Leases</font>&#8221; means all leases that have been or should be, in accordance with GAAP, recorded as capitalized leases.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Collateralize</font>&#8221; means, to pledge and deposit with or deliver to the Administrative Agent, for the benefit of one or more of the L/C Issuers or Swingline Lender (as applicable) or the Lenders, as collateral for L/C Obligations, the Obligations in respect of Swingline Loans, or obligations of the Revolving Lenders to fund participations in respect of either thereof (as the context may require), (a) cash or deposit account balances, (b) backstop letters of credit entered into on terms, from issuers and in amounts satisfactory to the Administrative Agent and the applicable L/C Issuer, and/or (c) if the Administrative Agent and the applicable L/C Issuer or Swingline Lender shall agree, in their sole discretion, other credit support, in each case, in Dollars and pursuant to documentation in form and substance satisfactory to the Administrative Agent and such L/C Issuer or Swingline Lender (as applicable).&#160;&#160;&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Collateral</font>&#8221; shall have a meaning correlative to the foregoing and shall include the proceeds of such cash collateral and other credit support.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Equivalents</font>&#8221; means any of the following types of Investments, to the extent owned by the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries free and clear of all Liens (other than Permitted Liens):</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;readily marketable obligations issued or directly and fully guaranteed or insured by the United States or any agency or instrumentality thereof having maturities of not more than three hundred sixty days (360) days from the date of acquisition thereof; <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">provided that</font> the full faith and credit of the United States is pledged in support thereof;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;time deposits with, or insured certificates of deposit or bankers&#8217; acceptances of, any commercial bank that (i)&#160;(A)&#160;is a Lender or (B)&#160;is organized under the laws of the United States, any state thereof or the District of Columbia or is the principal banking subsidiary of a bank holding company organized under the laws of the United States, any state thereof or the District of Columbia, and is a member of the Federal Reserve System, (ii)&#160;issues (or the parent of which issues) commercial paper rated as described in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clause (c)</font> of this definition and (iii)&#160;has </font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">6</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">combined capital and surplus of at least $1,000,000,000, in each case with maturities of not more than ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition thereof;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;commercial paper in an aggregate amount of no more than $10,000,000 per issuer outstanding at any time issued by any Person organized under the laws of any state of the United States and rated at least &#8220;Prime-1&#8221; (or the then equivalent grade) by Moody&#8217;s or at least &#8220;A-1&#8221; (or the then equivalent grade) by S&amp;P, in each case with maturities of not more than one hundred eighty (180) days from the date of acquisition thereof; and</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Investments, classified in accordance with GAAP as current assets of the Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries, in money market investment programs registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940, which are administered by financial institutions that have the highest rating obtainable from either Moody&#8217;s or S&amp;P, and the portfolios of which are limited solely to Investments of the character, quality and maturity described in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clauses (a)</font>, <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(b)</font> and <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(c)</font> of this definition.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management Agreement</font>&#8221; means any agreement that is not prohibited by the terms hereof to provide treasury or cash management services, including deposit accounts, overnight draft, credit cards, debit cards, p-cards (including purchasing cards and commercial cards), funds transfer, automated clearinghouse, zero balance accounts, returned check concentration, controlled disbursement, lockbox, account reconciliation and reporting and trade finance services and other cash management services.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Cash Management Bank</font>&#8221; means any Person in its capacity as a party to a Cash Management Agreement that, (a)&#160;at the time it enters into a Cash Management Agreement with a Loan Party or any Subsidiary, is a Lender or an Affiliate of a Lender, or (b)&#160;at the time it (or its Affiliate) becomes a Lender, is a party to a Cash Management Agreement with a Loan Party or any Subsidiary, in each case in its capacity as a party to such Cash Management Agreement (even if such Person ceases to be a Lender or such Person&#8217;s Affiliate ceased to be a Lender); <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">provided, however</font>, that for any of the foregoing to be included as a &#8220;Secured Cash Management Agreement&#8221; on any date of determination by the Administrative Agent, the applicable Cash Management Bank (other than the Administrative Agent or an Affiliate of the Administrative Agent) must have delivered a Secured Party Designation Notice to the Administrative Agent prior to such date of determination.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CERCLA</font>&#8221;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>means the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Act of 1980.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CERCLIS</font>&#8221;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>means the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation and Liability Information System maintained by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">CFC</font>&#8221; means a Person that is a controlled foreign corporation under Section 957 of the Code.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Change in Law</font>&#8221; means the occurrence, after the Closing Date, of any of the following:&#160;&#160;(a)&#160;the adoption or taking effect of any law, rule, regulation or treaty, (b)&#160;any change in any law, rule, regulation or treaty or in the administration, interpretation, implementation or application thereof by any Governmental Authority or (c)&#160;the making or issuance of any request, rule, guideline or directive (whether or not having the force of law) by any Governmental Authority; <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">provided that</font> notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, (i)&#160;the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act and all requests, rules, guidelines or directives thereunder or issued in connection therewith and (ii)&#160;all requests, rules, guidelines or directives promulgated by the Bank for International Settlements, the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (or any successor or similar authority) or the United States or foreign </font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">7</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">regulatory authorities, in each case pursuant to Basel III, shall in each case be deemed to be a &#8220;Change in Law&#8221;, regardless of the date enacted, adopted or issued.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Change of Control</font>&#8221; means an event or series of events by which:</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt; COLOR: black">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">any &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; (as such terms are used in Sections&#160;13(d) and 14(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, but excluding any employee benefit plan of such person or its subsidiaries, and any person or entity acting in its capacity as trustee, agent or other fiduciary or administrator of any such plan) becomes the &#8220;beneficial owner&#8221; (as defined in Rules&#160;13d-3 and 13d-5 under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, except that a person or group shall be deemed to have &#8220;beneficial ownership&#8221; of all securities that such person or group has the right to acquire, whether such right is exercisable immediately or only after the passage of time (such right, an &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">option right</font>&#8221;)), directly or indirectly, (i) any of the equity securities of the Borrower entitled to vote for members of the board of directors or equivalent governing body of the Borrower on a fully-diluted basis (and taking into account all such securities that such &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; has the right to acquire pursuant to any option right), or (ii) 30% or more of the equity securities of (A) Trecora Resources entitled to vote for members of the board of directors or equivalent governing body of Trecora Resources on a fully-diluted basis (and taking into account all such securities that such &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; has the right to acquire pursuant to any option right), or (B) any other indirect parent of the Borrower entitled to vote for members of the board of directors or equivalent governing body of such parent on a fully-diluted basis (and taking into account all such securities that such &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; has the right to acquire pursuant to any option right); or</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt; COLOR: black">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">during any period of twelve (12) consecutive months, a majority of the members of the board of directors or other equivalent governing body of the Borrower, Trecora Resources, or any other direct or indirect parent of the Borrower, cease to be composed of individuals (i)&#160;who were members of that board or equivalent governing body on the first day of such period, (ii)&#160;whose election or nomination to that board or equivalent governing body was approved by individuals referred to in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clause (i)</font> above constituting at the time of such election or nomination at least a majority of that board or equivalent governing body, or (iii)&#160;whose election or nomination to that board or other equivalent governing body was approved by individuals referred to in <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clauses&#160;(i)</font> and <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(ii)</font> above constituting at the time of such election or nomination at least a majority of that board or equivalent governing body (excluding, in the case of both <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clause&#160;(ii)</font> and <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clause</font> <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(iii)</font>, any individual whose initial nomination for, or assumption of office as, a member of that board or equivalent governing body occurs as a result of an actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents for the election or removal of one or more directors by any person or group other than a solicitation for the election of one or more directors by or on behalf of the board of directors); or</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt; COLOR: black">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">any Person or two or more Persons acting in concert shall have acquired, by contract or otherwise, or shall have entered into a contract or arrangement that, upon consummation thereof, will result in its or their acquisition of the power to exercise, directly or indirectly, a controlling influence over the management or policies of the Borrower, Trecora Resources, or any other direct or indirect parent of the Borrower or Trecora Resources or control over the equity securities of the Borrower, Trecora Resources, or any other direct or indirect parent of the Borrower or Trecora Resources entitled to vote for members of the board of directors or equivalent governing body of the Borrower, Trecora Resources, or any other direct or indirect parent of the Borrower or Trecora Resources, as the case may be, in each case on a fully-diluted basis (and taking into account all such securities that such Person or Persons have the </font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">right to acquire pursuant to any option right) representing 30% or more of the combined voting power of such securities; or</font></div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">8</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt; COLOR: black">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the Borrower shall cease, directly or indirectly, to own and control legally and beneficially all of the Equity Interests in each of their respective Subsidiaries; or</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 72pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="LETTER-SPACING: 9pt; COLOR: black">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Trecora Resources shall cease, directly or indirectly, to own and control legally and beneficially all of the Equity Interests in Borrower.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chusei</font>&#8221; means SSI Chusei, Inc., a Texas corporation, which after giving effect to the Chusei Acquisition, will be a wholly-owned Subsidiary of Borrower.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chusei Acquisition</font>&#8221; means the Acquisition by Borrower of 100% of the Equity Interests of Chusei under and pursuant to the Chusei Acquisition Documents.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chusei Acquisition Agreement</font>&#8221; means that certain Stock Purchase Agreement dated September 19, 2014, by and among, Trecora Resources, Borrower, Chusei, and Schuman/Steir Holdings, LLC, together with all schedules, exhibits, and appendices thereto.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Chusei Acquisition Documents</font>&#8221; means the Chusei Acquisition Agreement and all other documents and instruments executed or delivered in connection therewith.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Closing Date</font>&#8221; means the date of this Agreement.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Code</font>&#8221; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral</font>&#8221; means all of the &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral</font>&#8221; and &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Mortgaged Property</font>&#8221; referred to in the Collateral Documents and all of the other property that is or is intended under the terms of the Collateral Documents to be subject to Liens in favor of the Administrative Agent for the benefit of the Secured Parties.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Collateral Documents</font>&#8221; means, collectively, the Security Agreements, the Mortgages, any related Mortgaged Property Support Documents, the Pledge Agreements, each Joinder Agreement, each of the mortgages, collateral assignments, security agreements, pledge agreements or other similar agreements delivered to the Administrative Agent pursuant to <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 6.14</font>, and each of the other agreements, instruments or documents that creates or purports to create a Lien in favor of the Administrative Agent for the benefit of the Secured Parties.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Commitment</font>&#8221; means an Acquisition Term Commitment, Term Commitment or a Revolving Commitment, as the context may require.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Commodity Exchange Act</font>&#8221; means the Commodity Exchange Act (7 U.S.C. &#167; 1 <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">et seq</font>.), as amended from time to time, and any successor statute.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Compliance Certificate</font>&#8221; means a certificate substantially in the form of <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit&#160;C</font>.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Connection Income Taxes</font>&#8221; means Other Connection Taxes that are imposed on or measured by net income (however denominated) or that are franchise Taxes or branch profits Taxes.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">9</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>

<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated</font>&#8221; means, when used with reference to financial statements or financial statement items of Borrower and its Subsidiaries or any other Person, such statements or items on a consolidated basis in accordance with the consolidation principles of GAAP.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Asset Coverage Ratio</font>&#8221; means, as of any date of determination, the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">ratio</font> of (a) the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">sum</font> of (i) the aggregate amount of all of the Loan Parties&#8217; accounts receivable, <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">plus </font>(ii)&#160;the aggregate amount of all of the Loan Parties&#8217; inventory (measured on the lower of cost or market basis), <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">plus</font> (iii)&#160;the fair market value of all of the Loan Parties&#8217; machinery, equipment and other fixed assets (based on an as-completed appraisal of the foregoing acceptable to the Administrative Agent), <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">plus</font> (iv) the fair market value of the Mortgaged Property (based on an Appraisal of the foregoing acceptable to the Administrative Agent), in each case under this <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">clause&#160;(a)</font> on which the Administrative Agent for the ratable benefit of the lenders has a valid and perfected first priority Lien to (b)&#160;the Outstanding Amount of Loans <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">plus</font> the Outstanding Amount with respect to L/C Obligations <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">minus</font> the amount of cash and Cash Equivalents of the Loan Parties in an amount up to, but not in excess of, $15,000,000.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated EBITDA</font>&#8221;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>means, for any period, the sum of the following determined on a Consolidated basis, without duplication, for the Loan Parties in accordance with GAAP, Consolidated Net Income for the most recently completed Measurement Period <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">plus</font> (a) the following to the extent deducted in calculating such Consolidated Net Income (without duplication):&#160;&#160;(i)&#160;Consolidated Interest Charges, (ii)&#160;the provision for Federal, state, local and foreign income taxes payable, (iii)&#160;depreciation and amortization expense; and (iv)&#160;other non-recurring expenses reducing such Consolidated Net Income which (A) do not represent a cash item in such period or any future period (in each case of or by the Loan Parties for such Measurement Period) and (B) are approved in writing by the Administrative Agent, and <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">minus</font> (b) the following to the extent included in calculating such Consolidated Net Income:&#160;&#160;(i) Federal, state, local and foreign income tax credits; and (ii) all non-cash items increasing Consolidated Net Income (in each case of or by the Loan Parties for such Measurement Period) which are approved in writing by the Administrative Agent.</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br>
</div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio</font>&#8221;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font>means, as of any date of determination, the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">ratio</font> of (a)&#160;(i)&#160;Consolidated EBITDA, <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">minus</font> (ii)&#160;the aggregate amount of all Maintenance Capital Expenditures up to, but not in excess of, two and one-half percent (2.50%) of the Loan Parties&#8217; revenue for the four (4) fiscal quarter period then ended, <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">minus </font>(iii)&#160;the aggregate amount of all Restricted Payments, <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">minus</font> (iv)&#160;the aggregate amount of Federal, state, local and foreign income Taxes paid in cash, to (b)&#160;the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">sum</font> of (i)&#160;Consolidated Interest Charges, (ii)&#160;the aggregate principal amount of all redemptions or similar acquisitions for value of outstanding debt for borrowed money or regularly scheduled principal payments, but excluding any such payments to the extent refinanced through the incurrence of additional Indebtedness otherwise expressly permitted under <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Section 7.02</font>, in each case, of or by the Loan Parties for the most recently completed Measurement Period.&#160;&#160;For purposes of calculating the Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio as of any date of determination, Consolidated EBITDA shall be calculated on a pro forma basis (A) assuming that (1)&#160;all Acquisitions made by Borrower or any of its Subsidiaries, and any Indebtedness incurred or repaid in connection therewith, in each case during the most recently completed Measurement Period, and (2)&#160;all Dispositions of (x) any Subsidiary, (y) all or substantially all of the assets of any Subsidiary, or (z) any line of business or division of Borrower or any Subsidiary completed, and any Indebtedness incurred or repaid in connection therewith, in each case during the most recently completed Measurement Period, have been made, incurred, or repaid (as the case may be) on the first day of such Measurement Period (but without any adjustment for projected cost savings or other synergies other than, without duplication, cost savings or synergies realized as of the time of determination and evidenced by financial statements acceptable to the Administrative Agent in its sole reasonable discretion), and (B) using the historical financial results of any such Person, Subsidiary, or business line or division acquired or disposed of during the most recently completed Measurement Period.&#160;&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;</font></div>

<div id="PGBRK" style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">&#160; </font></div>
</div>

<div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">10</font></div>

<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%">
